src:
Tories leder före Labour inför nyvalet
Inför nyvalet den 12 december får det brittiska konservativa partiet, lett av premiärminister Boris Johnson, åtta procentenheter mer än oppositionspartiet Labour i en väljarmätning som opinionsinstitutet ORB gjort för The Sunday Telegraph.
02 Nov 2019, 19:18 by TT

text:
The Tories are leading Labor ahead of the re-election
Ahead of the recent December 12 election, the British Conservative Party, led by Prime Minister Boris Johnson, gets eight percentage points more than Labor's opposition party in a poll conducted by the opinion poll ORB for The Sunday Telegraph.
02 Nov 2019, 19:18 by TT
